uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.awtlayout

Class AbstractAWTLayout<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.awtlayout.AbstractAWTLayout<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAWTReactionLayout, AtomLayout, LinearAtomContainerSetLayout, MoleculeLayout

    public abstract class AbstractAWTLayout<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A layout object that uses a java.awt.Graphics2D instance to work out text sizes, which makes the layout more precise than just using atom positions.
    Author:
    maclean
